content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

How to Sell Your Used or Broken Device

Looking to buy yourself a new device?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”block”][vc_column]

Cash for Device

We will give you cash for your used or broken device.

We Will Come

to you to collect your device & pass you cash.

Relax

Sit back & relax. Enjoy our service at your convenience.

Reduce E-waste

by putting your old device into good use
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1530588295682{background-image: url(http://smartdata.tonytemplates.com/computer-repairs/cellphonefix/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/07/bg-skew-img-02.jpg?id=1589) !important;}” el_class=”block nopad”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1530531846550{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

Sell Device

Looking to sell your phone or tablet?

Upgrade to a premium grade, NH iPhone Repair Certified, pre-owned device and save big! Don’t pay an arm and a leg for a new iPhone, iPad or Android device, pick one from our collection of pre-owned devices! Our pre-owned quality tested iPhones and iPads undergo a thorough 25-point inspection to ensure 100% functionality of each device. All devices are backed with a 90 day warranty!

View Locations
Go to shop
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”block”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1530588334185{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center max-width” css=”.vc_custom_1536378887273{margin-bottom: 24px !important;}”]

Recycle Used Devices & Computers

Our team is trained to help you get the most life out of your digital device, but if it’s ready to go to greener
pastures, you can trust us to recycle it for you.

There is no guarantee that the e-waste will be processed responsibly once it has passed downstream. Tracing what happens to it after it has been trucked to a processing center is not the easiest undertaking. Our certification is a critical part of how we ensure we are living our mission – for our partners, our consumers, and our environment. Products we recycle:[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-3 vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1530589424882{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

  • TV and Video
  • Computers & Tablets
  • Cell Phones & Radios
  • Rechargeable Batteries

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-4″][vc_column_text]

  • Video Games & Gadgets
  • Cameras & Camcorders
  • Audio
  • Car Audio, Video & GPS

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” el_class=”block nopad overflowUnset” css=”.vc_custom_1530525374217{background-image: url(http://smartdata.tonytemplates.com/computer-repairs/cellphonefix/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2018/07/bg-skew-img-01.jpg?id=1572) !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1530525426277{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

Sell Device

Looking to sell your phone or tablet?

We want to buy your device for CASH! We will pay you top dollar for your broken or damaged smartphone or tablet. All you have to do is fill out the form, we’ll send you back a quote within few hours, you mail in your phone, we will send cash in the form of money order, company check, or paypal. It’s as simple as that. Fill out the form to get a free quote to sell your phone or tablet.

Sell USED device

Sell Your Device






    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”block”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1529730861385{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

    Some Frequently Asked Questions

    We can Solve your Hardware and Software Problems

    [/vc_column_text]

    When do I get paid?–+

    We will send payment within 2 business days after the phone is received and inspected. We receive your phone about 5 business days after you send it in or drop it off, so you can expect to be paid within 7-10 business days from the time you send it. All payments are sent through PayPal.

    What devices are ineligible for trade-in?–+

    We will always offer you a fixed price for the repair, for example if your laptop screen needs replacing we will give you a total price for the work before starting. In the event we need to diagnose the fault first we charge £30 labour which is waived if you go ahead with the repair. We don’t want you to have any nasty surprises; we want you to know exactly what your repair will cost before we complete the work.

    How does trade-in works?–+

    Offering a personal service is top of our list; you will speak directly to the person working on your computer so you can explain the situation in detail. We turnaround repairs quickly, we don’t send anything away to service centres and we don’t quote 5+ days for repairs. We don’t charge any upfront costs, you only pay for work once it’s completed and when you are happy with it.

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”text-center”][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”text-center max-width”]

    Have a Question?

    If the question you have has not yet been answered here, use the form with clicking ask question button to ask something about buying or selling devices.

    [/vc_column_text]

    Ask question

      [/vc_column][/vc_row]
